name: Dissolving OST Support Pack
detailed_description:
This DLC contains original soundtrack for both scenarios from Emmitt and some of the art materials. It is meant for those who wanted to support us. Hope you enjoyed the game! You can see the tracklist below.

Dissolving

01. Dissolving: Moebius hiss
02. Dissolving: We’ll meet again
03. Dissolving: Buzzing
04. Dissolving: Danger
05. Dissolving: Tension
06. Dissolving: The Dissolving Self
07. Dissolving: Speaking in tongues
08. Dissolving: We’ll meet again (music box version)
09. Dissolving: My last sunset

Dissolving Hunter

01. Dissolving Hunter: Intro
02. Dissolving Hunter: In the grip
03. Dissolving Hunter: The first bite
04. Dissolving Hunter: Charon’s vessel
05. Dissolving Hunter: Memory lane
06. Dissolving Hunter: We’ll meet again (haunted version)
07. Dissolving Hunter: Mutation
08. Dissolving Hunter: Digital world
09. Dissolving Hunter: Silent hunter
10. Dissolving: Moebius hiss (heavy version)


All tracks are available in 44.1 kHz 16-Bit WAV and 320 kbps MP3.

Please look for them in the "Media" folder of the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
